commit.message:
System.java (properties): Use Properties.clone.

	* java/lang/System.java (properties): Use Properties.clone.
	(setProperties): Likewise.

From-SVN: r62903

files.patch:

+	* java/lang/System.java (properties): Use Properties.clone.
+	(setProperties): Likewise.
